timeline.message: order is not returned as array

timeline.author: earce

timeline.bodyText: should currency pair not be added into this as well?
timeline.author: earce

replies.bodyText: Unfortunately the API does not provide currency pair here.
replies.author: stachon

timeline.bodyText: should currency pair not be added into this as well?
timeline.author: earce

replies.bodyText: Unfortunately the API does not provide currency pair here.
replies.author: stachon

timeline.bodyText:
Not necessary but a bit more elegant you can do something like
return Collections.singletonList(new MarketOrder(orderType,  
    entry.getOriginalAmount(),
    null,  
    Long.toString(entry.getId()),  
    new Date(entry.getTimestamp()),  
    entry.getAvgPrice(),  
    entry.getOriginalAmount().subtract(entry.getRemainingAmount()),  
    null,  
    orderStatus,  
    null));
timeline.author: earce
